Articles.Content: Every once in a while my engines will not re-enable despite re-enabling fuel flow. I am uncertain if this is a staging problem (the engines were on stage 1 and I'm on stage 0) or if this is a bug relating to changing vehicles. I'd like to bring my guys home from orbit, but I've no means of slowing them down unless the engines will restart. Any ideas?

Make sure everything is enabled.

Exit back to the Tracking Station.

Go back to your craft... hopefully the fuel flow should all reset.

Pretty much what Bsalis said, I found it out too. You need to be able to go back to tracking station. When you reload up the ship in flight, the fuel flow would be going well. Unfortunately if you are using this for a spaceplace, means a landing to do the reload, not so good for your speed efficiency.

Have you ever had success with this? It seems to be happening constantly, making the game almost unplayable. Every... single... time.... I leave the game and come back my craft are useless, and going back to the tracking station hasn't fixed one yet.
